directions: Melt butter in a large skillet or saute pan over medium heat.  Saute mushrooms, spinach, basil, salt, pepper and garlic until mushrooms are tender and spinach is heated through.
Pour in wine and reduce heat to low; simmer 1 minute.  Stir in Parmesan cheese and serve.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
title: Sauteed Portobellos and Spinach
